title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: When developing a sensor, consider whether the goal is to measure, identify, or understand a fundamental property.

title: Different Types of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, analysis can be qualitative, quantitative, characterization, or fundamental. Think about what each type involves.

title: Focus on Fundamental Analysis
text: Fundamental analysis often involves understanding the basic principles or mechanisms behind a phenomenon, such as sensor development.

title: Identify the Analysis Type
text: Based on the goal of developing a sensor for methane detection, what type of analysis is being conducted?
